member.name: MIB_ICMP_EX
member.summary: TheMIB_ICMP_EX structure contains the extended Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) statistics for a particular computer.

member.name: MIB_ICMP_EX.icmpInStats
member.summary: Specifies an structure that contains the extended statistics for incoming ICMP messages.

member.name: MIB_ICMP_EX.icmpOutStats
member.summary: Specifies an structure that contains the extended statistics for outgoing ICMP messages.
